page.title: 17OLD PEOPLES HOME
page.content: 54 old people live in wheatacres permanently,30 people in day care.The problems they face are ill health and shortage of money.They've got 3 cooks, 3 kitchen assistants,4 domestics, 6 night staff ,12 care attendants and 1 temporary.These are all staff they have.all of the staff enjoy working there but have some trouble with diff- icult people. There are 50 rooms in the building and 1 self-contained 3 bedroom flat. They have a set meal but the fussy ones can have different things.For supper they have tea and biscuits.They have a few nights with entertainment with a choir singing and a man plays the piano.If they could change the building they would make it on 1 level so there wasn't any stairs.They have enough old people as it is.They occasi nally go on trips around the area.
